ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems
ygData.msgSnippet: No actually the reason I started singing GR was because COB wasn t doing anything.  I was getting annoyed because I could get only one song (hymm) to do
ygData.messageBody:
No actually the reason I started singing GR was because COB wasn't doing
anything. I was getting annoyed because I could get only one song
(hymm) to do anything. I felt like I wasn't holding up my end of the
bargain.

I tried to repeat the troubles last night (to check some other songs)
but I never grouped with an enchanter...

Danny Craigg wrote:
>
> >The COB would stack when I wasn't fighting
>
> You mentioned you were singing Guardian Rhythms at one point, for the AC
> buff. Were you having issues with COB stacking only while GR was in the
> twist? Since both have an AC component, I'm speculating they won't stack
> with each other. I'm never tried that particular twist, so, as I said, I'm
> only speculating.
>
> Raiel
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> You have a voice mail message waiting for you at iHello.com:
> http://click.egroups.com/1/3555/7/_/451022/_/957221790/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.

We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
